text: Kogda volna nakryvayet ikh, slovno ten', oni vzyvayut k Allakhu, ochishchaya pered Nim svoyu veru. Kogda zhe On spasayet ikh i vyvodit na sushu, to sredi nikh nakhoditsya tot, kto proyavlyayet umerennost' (proyavlyayet pokornost' ili uklonyayetsya ot dolzhnoy blagodarnosti). No otvergayut Nashi znameniya tol'ko neblagodarnyye izmenniki
